sentences.en: Being gentle and cultivated is just a scholar's attitude.
sentences.cn: 温文尔雅正是学者的态度.

sentences.en: He claimed to be a scholar but was not such.
sentences.cn: 他自称是个学者,但实际上并非如此.

sentences.en: He is a scholar of the highest attainments in this field.
sentences.cn: 他在这一领域是一位颇有造就的学者.

sentences.en: He is a scholar, if ever there was one.
He was a highly regarded scholar.
sentences.cn: 他是一位声誉很高的学者。

sentences.en: He was a singer, but first and foremost a scholar.
sentences.cn: 他是个歌手, 但他主要是一位学者.

sentences.en: He was the most distinguished scholar in his field.
sentences.cn: 他是这一领域成就最为卓著的学者。

sentences.en: Kingdon's broad experience, as writer and scholar, suffuses this important book.
sentences.cn: 金登身为作家和学者的丰富阅历在这部重要的著作中体现得淋漓尽致。

sentences.en: Official handouts describe the Emperor as "particularly noted as a scholar".
sentences.cn: 官方印发的材料将皇帝描述为“尤以学识渊博而著称”。

sentences.en: Old as he is, he is still a scholar.
She had visited the old scholar who avoided publicity.
sentences.cn: 她拜访过那位不想引人注意的老学者.
荷兰的大学问家伊拉斯谟

sentences.en: The old scholar's writing is always full of tags.
sentences.cn: 那位老学者的文章里总是有很多名言警句.

sentences.en: The visitor is the late President, now a scholar.
sentences.cn: 这位来访者是前总统, 现为学者.

sentences.en: There was no doubt that he was a fine scholar.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,他是位杰出的学者.

sentences.en: To be a scholar is to be the top of society.
sentences.cn: 万般皆下品,惟有读书高.
